articles.title: Google Expands AI Image Generator ‘Whisk' to More Regions
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Google is expanding access to its 'Whisk' generative AI image tool to 100 more regions after initially launching it to U.S. users in December. Whisk simplifies image creation by allowing users to input images for context along with text prompts, and is free to use.

articles.title: Handy new app lets you scan labels for Canadian-made goods
articles.summary: Punchcard Systems has launched "Check the Label," a new app designed to help Canadians identify and purchase Canadian-made products. The app allows users to scan barcodes or manually enter product names to determine the product's origin, utilizing AI and community votes to validate information. "Check the Label" is available on browsers, Google Play, and the Apple App Store.

articles.title: Elegance Unframed in Danvers, MA, with IDEAL's Exquisite Frameless Shower Doors
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: IDEAL Shower Doors has expanded its frameless line of architecturally inspired shower doors in Danvers, MA, offering a transformative upgrade for bathrooms. The new collection emphasizes clean lines and minimalist design, aiming to elevate the everyday showering experience with safety, durability, and comprehensive warranty. These custom shower doors are tailored to individual needs, ensuring a perfect fit and lasting quality.

articles.title: Elegance Unframed in Danvers, MA, with IDEAL's Exquisite Frameless Shower Doors
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: IDEAL Shower Doors is expanding its frameless line of architecturally inspired shower doors in Danvers, MA. The expansion indicates an upgrade to the company's existing product line.

articles.title: Too many models, too much confusion: OpenAI pledges to simplify its product line
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: OpenAI is planning to release GPT-4.5, its last non-chain-of-thought model, internally called Orion. Furthermore, OpenAI plans to integrate its technology, including the o-series of models, into GPT-5 when it launches on ChatGPT and its APIs. The company aims to unify o-series models and GPT-series models by creating systems that can use all tools, think for a long time when necessary, and be useful for a wide range of tasks.

articles.title: The 'genius' $25 Kmart kitchen solution everyone is raving about right now - and it's still in stock
articles.author: CINDY TRAN
articles.summary: Kmart has launched a $25 portable blender, available in stores across Australia, designed for on-the-go smoothies. Additionally, Kmart introduced a $29 compact garment steamer with a detachable water tank, ideal for travel and quick wrinkle touch-ups.

articles.title: Veel Introduces Launchpad – The AI-Powered Video Marketing Revolution for Small Businesses
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Transforming Local Business Marketing with Authentic Creator-Generated Content has launched 'Launchpad', a new AI-driven solution for small businesses. Launchpad aims to expand digital presence for its users. The company expresses excitement about the potential of Launchpad as a game-changer.

articles.title: The best Valentine's Day flower delivery services to send a bouquet by Friday, tested and reviewed
articles.author: Amanda Garrity
articles.summary: 1-800-Flowers, FTD, ProFlowers, and Teleflora are online flower delivery services that use local florists to fulfill orders. Customers can maintain the flowers' freshness from these providers by trimming stems, changing water, and keeping flowers away from direct heat, air conditioning, or sunlight. Flower food or a mix of bleach and sugar can extend the life of the fresh blooms.

articles.title: Veel Introduces Launchpad – The AI-Powered Video Marketing Revolution for Small Businesses
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Veel launched 'Launchpad,' an AI-driven solution designed for SMBs to simplify video marketing by connecting them with social media influencers and UGC creators. Launchpad aims to provide an accessible platform for businesses to enhance their social presence through effective social media and influencer marketing. Veel is initially onboarding local businesses in San Francisco, planning a nationwide expansion by the end of February.

articles.title: What goes into designing that popular teapot or water bottle? 2 top creators discuss the process
articles.author: Kim Cook
articles.summary: Scott Henderson designed the 'Moby' spout cover for Skip Hop, and also collaborated with ZVerse to create a new kind of face shield. Whipsaw collaborated with Owala, part of Trove Brands, on the FreeSip water bottle and worked with fitness company Tonal on a smart home gym system.

articles.title: Feeling lucky? Bogg Bag dropped a St. Patrick's Day collection starting at $60
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Bogg Bag is promoting its Original Bogg Bag and its new version 'You Got Lucky'. This large tote bag is designed for various outdoor activities, featuring durable, washable, and waterproof construction. The 'You Got Lucky' design offers a stylish and functional option, with a spacious design and easy-to-clean material.

articles.title: 20 Practical Things Worth Buying From Presidents' Day Sales
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Several companies are offering discounts on their products. Nespresso has a sale on their Vertuo Plus, Article is discounting their motorized standing desks, and Baby Brezza is offering a discount on their formula maker. These discounts are part of Presidents' Day sales events.

articles.title: The Steam Deck Is Our Path To Ending Microsoft's Death Grip On Personal Computers
articles.author: @Bsa Grant89127
articles.summary: Valve launched the Steam Deck, a handheld gaming PC powered by SteamOS, an upgraded version of Proton which is designed to run Windows games seamlessly on Linux. Valve is actively supporting its operating system on other portable gaming devices so even more people can take advantage of the optimizations and strong Steam integration.

articles.title: 'Amazon's Shopping App to Include Listings for Items Not Sold by Amazon'
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Amazon is beta-testing a new 'Shop brand sites directly' feature within its shopping app. This feature allows customers to search for and find products, even those not sold on Amazon, and then be redirected to the brand's website to make a purchase. Amazon plans to expand the feature based on beta test feedback.

articles.title: Amazon's app will start listing items Amazon doesn't sell
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Amazon is beta-testing a new 'Shop brand sites directly' feature within its shopping app. This feature displays products from brands not sold on Amazon, directing users to the brand's website for purchase. The feature is currently available to select U.S. customers on iOS and Android, and Amazon plans to expand it based on beta test feedback.

articles.title: Amazon has last-chance gifts with fast delivery for Prime members. Shop Fanttik, Stanley, Jellycat
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Amazon Prime members can purchase Stanley Tumblers, Fanttik car vacuums, and various skincare and beauty products. Valentine's day deals include Dyson hair styling tools at a discount and up to 49% off on Beats headphones.

articles.title: The Fluffy Mattress Pad Reviewers Say Relieves Back, Neck, And Hip Pain Is $37 At Walmart
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a mattress topper designed to enhance sleep quality and mattress comfort. The topper features quilted pockets of down alternative, deep pockets for secure placement, and is machine-washable. It is currently on sale, with prices starting at $39.79 for a queen-size and discounts up to 63% off on other sizes.

articles.title: Beauty Buzz: The 3 best skin-care and beauty products we tried this week
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: A face moisturizer with collagen peptides promises plump, hydrated skin for up to 24 hours. Summer Fridays launched four new hues of their popular lip oil, featuring a vegan oil complex and Vitamin E, promising high-shine and intense hydration.

articles.title: YouTube Premium: Users Seek Free Alternatives for Paid Features
articles.author: Redação
articles.summary: NewPipe is presented as a free alternative to YouTube Premium, offering ad-free viewing, offline downloads, and background playback without requiring a subscription or Google account. Several other platforms, including Vanced Extended, SkyTube, and LibreTube, offer similar functionalities to users seeking to avoid YouTube Premium's fees. These alternatives pressure Google to rethink its subscription model for YouTube Premium.

articles.title: Fear of God Unisex NBA X ESSENTIALS Drop, Get Your NBA ESSENTIALS Gear
articles.author: Newsweek
articles.summary: NBA X ESSENTIALS released the second drop of their collaborative gear. The new product is available for purchase while supplies last.

articles.title: Valentine's Day Relationship Dilemmas
articles.author: Trent Gilbreath
articles.summary: Owala has expanded its product line by introducing new tumblers. These tumblers are designed with a leak-proof design for everyday hydration.

articles.title: The Unexpected Seasoning Hidden In Taco Bell's Guacamole
articles.author: Moriah House
articles.summary: Taco Bell is introducing the Baja Blast Dream Freeze as part of its new menu for 2025. In 2024, the company launched the limited-time Big Cheez-It Tostada. The article also discusses changes made to Taco Bell's guacamole recipe in 2022.

articles.title: Glean's latest AI release lets customers build digital agents that work while they sleep
articles.author: Melia Russell
articles.summary: Glean has launched new tools for building and managing digital agents, featuring agent libraries and real-time internet search capabilities. These tools enable employees to automate tasks by describing them in plain language, which Glean then parses and executes. The new release includes an agent library designed to help workers get started with pre-built agents

articles.title: Problem-solving products we can't imagine living without this year
articles.summary: Several companies have launched or are offering new products. Simons offers the Dotti Silicone Broom & Dustpan Set. Airwheel is offering the SE3S Smart Ride-On Luggage Suitcase. Lululemon has launched MacroPillow Tab Running Socks.

articles.title: Prompt Engineering for AI Chatbots: What You Need to Know and Why It's Important
articles.author: Mary-Elisabeth Combs
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy S25 series and Apple's iPhone 16 line integrate generative AI. Google search now includes AI Overviews. BMW and Audi are exploring adding AI capabilities to their dashboards. OpenAI's ChatGPT, Google's Gemini, Microsoft Copilot, and DeepSeek are AI-powered chatbots offering various AI services.

articles.title: Sky launches surprise new version of its Glass TV with major upgrades
articles.author: Freelance Journalist
articles.summary: Sky has launched the second generation of Sky Glass, featuring a brighter 4K HDR screen with 'Quantum Dot' technology and an upgraded seven-speaker Dolby Atmos sound system. The new model offers three new colors and an updated operating system with enhanced voice command capabilities, replacing the first generation Sky Glass.

articles.title: Sky launches surprise new version of its Glass TV with major upgrades
articles.author: Stephen Hurrell
articles.summary: Sky has launched the second generation of its Sky Glass TV, featuring upgrades such as a brighter 4K HDR screen with 'Quantum Dot' technology, an enhanced seven-speaker Dolby Atmos sound system, and new color options. The new TV also comes with an updated operating system with voice command capabilities, while the first generation model is no longer available for sale.

articles.title: Why Unilever has gone Wild for a deodorant challenger brand
articles.author: Daniel Selwood
articles.summary: Unilever is reportedly in talks to acquire Wild, a personal care brand known for its plastic-free and refillable deodorants, handwash and bodywash, for £230m. Wild's product line differentiates itself through its focus on sustainability, stylish packaging, and DTC approach, offering a premium alternative to Unilever's existing brands. The acquisition is expected to enhance Unilever's portfolio by adding Wild's existing range of products in sustainable personal care segment.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: ultra-thin flagship release date and features
articles.author: Saqib Shah
articles.summary: Samsung showcased the Galaxy S25 Edge at its Unpacked event in January. The S25 Edge features matte titanium sides and minimal borders, positioning it as a high-end flagship phone within the Galaxy S25 range.

articles.title: Sofas that self-assemble when you heat them up? How 4D printing could transform manufacturing
articles.author: The Conversation
articles.summary: OpenAI's Dall-E creates AI images, demonstrated by producing a flat-pack furniture concept. The technology could revolutionize product design and material usage.

articles.title: Startup Bob claims world first with refillable hard bodywash for men
articles.author: Daniel Selwood
articles.summary: Personal care startup Bob is launching its debut product, a refillable hard bodywash for men comprising a bespoke bodywash bar and applicator. The product is positioned as a sustainable alternative to liquid bodywash and traditional soap, will be available on welcometobob.com, and is priced at £21 for a starter bundle.

articles.title: Globalstar Rang Nasdaq Opening Bell on February 11, 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Globalstar highlighted its commercial IoT ecosystem, new spectrum, and applications for enterprise customers. The company's solutions address connectivity, data, and over-the-top applications for various sectors. Globalstar offers next-generation capabilities for critical infrastructure.

articles.title: Adobe to charge 50 Cents per AI video in new product launch
articles.author: Brody Ford
articles.summary: Adobe Inc. launched a new AI-powered video generation product with subscriptions priced at $9.99 or $29.99 per month, offering five-second video generation and unlimited AI photos and illustrations. The company aims to compete with AI startups like OpenAI and Runway, differentiating its product through integration with existing tools and copyright infringement safeguards. Adobe's Firefly AI models have been used extensively to generate photos and other media.

articles.title: 8 Best Clean Protein Powders to Try
articles.author: Amber Smith
articles.summary: Several companies, including Pro Nutrition Labs with its Whey Protein Powder for Women, NutraOne's ProteinOne Whey Protein, Mannatech's Protein Powder, LeanFit's Whey Protein Powder, PlantFusion's Inspire Plant Protein Powder, Rift's Chocolate 100% Whey Protein Powder and TGS Nutrition's Whey Protein Powder, offer various protein powder options. These products come in different flavors and protein content, and claim to aid muscle growth and recovery.

articles.title: Sky unveils surprise upgrade to its Glass TV with major new features
articles.author: Marc Reeves
articles.summary: Sky has launched the second generation Sky Glass TV, featuring a brighter 4K HDR screen with 'Quantum Dot' technology, an upgraded seven-speaker Dolby Atmos sound system, and three new color options. The new model also includes an updated operating system with over 500 tweaks and enhanced voice control capabilities.

articles.title: Basis Technologies Releases Unified Media Automation Platform for Brands
articles.summary: Basis Technologies launched 'Unify by Basis,' a new platform empowering advertisers with greater transparency and control over media buying and audience targeting. The platform gives brands full ownership of media data and offers expert consulting to drive efficiency and maximize ROI. RE/MAX has been a partner of Basis for years and claims the technology platform lifts the quality of their insights and increases accountability.

articles.title: $100 Off the Dyson Airwrap — Just in Time for Valentine's Day
articles.author: Rachael Griffiths
articles.summary: Dyson Airwrap and Dyson Supersonic hair dryer are currently on sale. The romantic strawberry-bronze edition of the Airwrap is $100 off with next-day delivery.

articles.title: 31 Transformative Cleaning Products That'll Make Everyone Wonder How You Have Time To Clean Your Home So Thoroughly
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article highlights various cleaning products, including Affresh washing machine cleaner, rust-removing gel spray, Bissell Little Green carpet cleaner, Dawn Powerwash, and O-Cedar mop, showcasing their unique features and benefits for different cleaning needs. These products offer effective solutions for tasks ranging from laundry to rust removal, carpet cleaning, dishwashing, and floor maintenance.

articles.title: 'Powerful' mould cleaner recipe refreshes washing machine doors in minutes
articles.author: Isobel Pankhurst
articles.summary: Tru Earth recommends using natural ingredients like lemon juice and salt to effectively and safely remove mold from washing machine rubber gaskets. For more stubborn mold, hydrogen peroxide can be used as a stronger antifungal solution.

articles.title: Nestl Announces Dairy Demonstration Farm, Invests Over '1.8 Billion in Dairy Development
articles.author: Daily Post
articles.summary: Nestl Nigeria launched a dairy demonstration farm in Paikon Kore. This launch marks a significant milestone in the company's commitment to enhancing the local dairy industry through the Nestl Nigeria Livestock Development Project (NLDP). The NLDP is structured around three pillars: Better Milk, Better Feed (fodder), and Resilient Communities.

articles.title: ServiceNow Launches Government Transformation Suite, Uniting High-Impact Solutions Tailored to Administration Priorities
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: ServiceNow launched the new Government Transformation Suite, designed to increase visibility, accelerate ROI, and drive efficiencies for U.S. federal agencies. The suite aims to help agencies manage assets, save time, transform worker experience, and optimize software investments. Additionally, ServiceNow announced accelerated availability for its agentic AI capabilities in the public sector.

articles.title: BYD Sealion 7 electric SUV launch soon: What you need to know
articles.author: Ht Auto Desk
articles.summary: BYD India is set to launch the new Sealion 7 premium electric SUV on February 17, 2025, with pre-bookings already open. Special benefits are available for the first 70 customers, including a contribution to the purchase and extended warranty. Deliveries will commence on March 7, 2025, for the Sealion 7, which will be available in Premium (RWD) and Performance (AWD) variants.

articles.title: Sweep up the savings with 38% off Bissell's top-rated cordless vacuum that shoppers say they'd buy 'again and again'
articles.author: JULIA REMILLARD
articles.summary: Bissell is offering the Crosswave Cordless Max Multi Surface Wet Dry Vacuum, a cordless cleaning tool capable of vacuuming and mopping simultaneously on various floor types. New QVC users can purchase it for $155 using code WELCOME15.

articles.title: Sky Glass Gen 2 is still just a mid-range TV - but I think that's OK
articles.author: Dan Grabham
articles.summary: Sky launched Sky Glass Gen 2, a QLED 4K TV with an updated brighter display and enhanced Dolby Atmos sound. Sky also announced that later in 2025, they plan to sell a cheaper version of Glass called Glass Air with a scaled-back sound system, targeting the entry-level market.

articles.title: PTC Launches ServiceMax AI, a Generative AI-Powered Field Service Assistant
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: PTC has launched ServiceMax AI, a field service management assistant powered by GenAI. This new product leverages asset history within the ServiceMax platform to aid field technicians by answering questions, automating tasks, and providing predictive maintenance recommendations. ServiceMax AI aims to modernize workflows and enhance the technician experience.

articles.title: Xiaomi Poco X7 Pro Review: Midrange Marvel
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Xiaomi's Poco X7 Pro is presented as a compelling option in the midrange category. The product is promoted as a good deal within its segment.

articles.title: The Ultimate Guide To Car Polish Spray: Enhance And Protect Your Vehic
articles.summary: Car Polish Spray is a new product designed to improve a car's appearance and provide protection against environmental damage. It's targeted towards car enthusiasts aiming to maintain their vehicle's value and keep it looking brand new.

articles.title: Optiva Launches Agentic AI for Telecom BSS, Powered by Google's Gemini Models
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Optiva Inc. has integrated agentic AI, powered by Google's Gemini models, into its BSS platform and charging engine. This new capability introduces virtual AI agents designed to enhance operational efficiency, reduce costs, and improve customer experience for telecommunications companies. Optiva's agentic AI BSS ecosystem includes AI agents like Amica for customer care, Kairos for operations management, and Sophos for sales, enabling intelligent automation, hyper-personalized customer experiences, and faster resolution times.

articles.title: Optiva Launches Agentic AI for Telecom BSS, Powered by Google's Gemini Models
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Optiva Inc. has incorporated agentic AI, using Google's Gemini models, into its BSS platform and charging engine. This integration aims to empower telcos with improved operational efficiency, cost reduction, and enhanced customer experience through virtual generative AI agents. The updated platform provides cloud-native billing, charging, and revenue management software.

articles.title: Optiva Launches Agentic AI for Telecom BSS, Powered by Google's Gemini Models
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Optiva Inc. has launched its BSS platform and charging engine, now incorporating agentic AI powered by Google's Gemini models. This update enables communication service providers (CSPs) to achieve improved outcomes through enhanced operational efficiency, cost savings, and customer experience. The agentic AI-powered BSS includes virtual AI agents like Amica, Kairos, and Sophos, which automate customer queries, enhance operational efficiency, and personalize customer engagement, respectively.

articles.title: Optiva Launches Agentic AI for Telecom BSS, Powered by Google's Gemini Models
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Optiva Inc. has launched its BSS platform and charging engine integrated with agentic AI, utilizing Google's Gemini models. This enhancement introduces virtual AI agents like Amica, Kairos and Sophos to automate customer service, enhance operational efficiency and personalize customer engagement. These AI agents aims to reduce operational costs and speed up market entry for communication service providers.

articles.title: New Sky Glass TV is out right now - and you might want to upgrade your telly
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Sky has launched Sky Glass Gen 2, its latest television technology with enhanced picture and sound quality. The new Sky Glass boasts improvements to the screen and sound system and interactive voice commands. Sky claims Gen 2 is more affordable with the new Essential TV pack.

articles.title: Hungry for growth, idli-dosa batter maker iD Fresh hunts for its next blockbuster product
articles.author: Samiksha Goel
articles.summary: iD Fresh Foods is expanding its product line by launching speciality batters like ragi and protein variants, as well as planning to introduce tender coconut water starting in Bengaluru. The company also intends to revamp existing product categories, such as spices, in the form of pastes and explore relaunching noodles.  iD Fresh aims to launch one new product every month and expand its reach to 50 more cities, projecting a 25% growth over the next 10 years with these new initiatives.

articles.title: Verint Opens First GIC in India, Plans to Onboard 1000 People by 2026
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Verint has opened a Global Innovation Centre (GIC) in Bangalore, India, focused on customer experience automation and AI Business Outcomes. The company intends to increase the workforce to 1,000 by the end of 2026. The GIC aims to develop best-in-class AI-powered solutions to meet the evolving needs of customers.

articles.title: Make this Valentine's Day unforgettable with these must have gadgets and tech gifts for men
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: Various companies offer tech gadgets ideal as Valentine's Day gifts. Apple, Samsung, and Google offer smartwatches, while Sony, Samsung, and Apple provide premium headphones. Tablets like Apple iPad and Samsung Galaxy Tab are also available, in addition to gaming consoles such as PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch. For adventurous men, DJI and GoPro provide drones and action cameras, while Meta, PlayStation, and Ray-Ban Meta offer VR headsets and smart glasses.

articles.title: The New USPS Truck Is Going Viral Again: "WTF Is Happening?"
articles.author: Matt Stopera
articles.summary: The USPS has introduced its Next Generation Delivery Vehicles (NGDVs) featuring a safer, more efficient, and environmentally friendly design. The new USPS trucks have received positive feedback from the public, who appreciate its unique and cartoonish aesthetic.

articles.title: This Incredibly Expensive Refrigerator Could Be Useful If Only It Wasn't Loaded With A Lot Of Extremely Weird Features
articles.author: Ben Auxier
articles.summary: A new refrigerator features an automatically opening door activated by a button press, though it is slower than manual opening. It also incorporates an AI vision system that detects food items placed inside and removed, generating a food list in the SmartThings App. The product's affordability and practical benefits, particularly for users needing assistance with door opening, are questioned.

articles.title: New Sky TV upgrade is released TODAY – I tried it first and was impressed with three blockbuster changes
articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.summary: Sky has released Sky Glass gen 2, the new version of its internet-based TV service. The new version features improved display with brighter 4K UHD Quantum Dot tech, enhanced sound with an added speaker, and easier installation with a simplified stand. The prices for Sky Glass gen 2 are unchanged, starting at £14 per month for 48 months + £20 upfront.

articles.title: Letter: New Hamburg postmaster eager to serve community
articles.author: Reading Eagle
articles.summary: The Postal Service is launching new products and services.

articles.title: How a Louisville startup is helping companies 'get your story right'
articles.author: Stephen P. Schmidt
articles.summary: Brad Luttrell launched Prologue, a company that provides content, coaching, and consulting services aimed at assisting startups with their brand storytelling. Prologue plans to introduce a monthly subscription service including online courses and a la carte tools. Furthermore, Luttrell intends to develop an undisclosed tech product through Prologue, funded by the consulting services.

articles.title: 'It's taken me 28 years to figure out how to shower properly - I was gross'
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: A woman shared her updated shower routine, incorporating several brand-name products. She begins with Dettol soap, followed by Nivea moisturizing body wash and Aldi's body scrub. She also uses Alberto Balsam shampoo, Inkey List cleanser and moisturizer, and Drunk Elephant bronzing drops, claiming these products and methods leave her feeling exceptionally clean.

articles.title: I wore Snap's new Spectacles glasses, and they made me a believer in AR
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Snap Inc. is developing Spectacles, augmented reality glasses featuring electrochromic lenses, a Qualcomm Snapdragon processor, and a 2000-nit display with a 120Hz refresh rate. Designed for developers, the Spectacles offer hand gesture controls and AR experiences through 'lenses,' showcasing potential applications beyond smartphones. However, the company is still far from launching the device to the public.

articles.title: Geely auto stock price rises 6.8% after L6 EM-i launch
articles.summary: Geely Galaxy launched the L6 EM-i, a new model priced at Rmb79.8k with improved fuel efficiency and the Flyme Auto system. This positions it against competitors like BYD. Geely's forthcoming AI launch event in early March will focus on their EM-i hybrid system and smart cockpit, revealing potential upgrades for smart driving.

articles.title: Tesco launches new bakery item with iconic chocolate brand that's 'to die for'
articles.author: Courtney Pochin
articles.summary: Tesco has launched Nutella Donuts, a new bakery item filled with Nutella, exclusively in their stores, with plans to expand to other supermarkets. Cadbury is also preparing to launch a Dairy Milk chocolate bar in partnership with Biscoff.

articles.title: AI at Your Service
articles.author: Fauzia Kerai Khan
articles.summary: Daraz uses AI-powered segmentation for personalized product recommendations and incentives. OLX employs AI to suggest interesting goods or services based on user activity. Foodpanda utilizes AI chatbots for engaging with clients during food ordering, and Zameen.com uses AI to predict when a visitor is most likely to purchase real estate.

articles.title: Car jump starter kit drivers say is 'worth every penny' sees huge discount
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: NOCO is offering the Boost Sport jump starter, a 500-amp lithium battery jump starter, on Amazon for a limited time at £63.96. This device jump starts a dead battery, functions as a power bank, includes an LED flashlight, and is designed with safety features.

articles.title: Acai Always elevates healthy indulgence with acai bowl and soft serve
articles.summary: Acai Always, founded by Justin David and Errol Alegre Jr., launched its first store in Manila, Philippines, offering Acai Sorbet Bowls and Soft Serve. The brand introduces a nutrient-rich, dairy-free alternative to traditional desserts, aiming to make healthy eating more accessible and enjoyable. Acai Always plans to expand with more branches in Metro Manila.

articles.title: T-Mobile Gives Away Free Pink Umbrellas to Customers
articles.author: Phone Arena
articles.summary: T-Mobile is offering a free, light magenta umbrella featuring its logo to customers as a promotional gift. Customers can reserve the umbrella through the T-Mobile Life app and redeem it at participating stores. The umbrella is compact, wide, and designed to shield from rain.

articles.title: Must-Have Cleaning Hacks That Will Revolutionize Your Life
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: Ronald Plotka, DDS, offers an antimicrobial toothbrush designed for a deeper clean. A small business founded in 2014 provides a pet stain remover for household cleaning. An aftercare formula is available to reduce the size of keloids with regular application.

articles.title: The Official Website {2025}- Your Key to Smarter Trading Decisions !
articles.summary: Momentum Glow AI, a new web-based AI trading platform, is designed to transform the trading industry. The platform offers features like advanced market analysis, real-time monitoring, automated trading strategies, and risk management tools to help traders make informed decisions. Its seamless integration with existing systems allows traders to optimize their trading strategies and maximize returns.

articles.title: Vertiv Announces Global Launch of Liquid Cooling Services Portfolio to Support Systems for AI and High-Density Compute Applications
articles.summary: Vertiv has launched Vertiv™ Liquid Cooling Services globally. This offering provides tools to enhance system availability and improve efficiency for advanced liquid cooling systems. The services include expert installation, maintenance, fluid management, spare parts availability, and end-to-end lifecycle support, targeting AI-driven and high-performance computing environments.

articles.title: Bright Prospects for Valentine's Day: TINECO Celebrates the Day of Love with Exclusive Discounts of up to 21%
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: During Valentine's week, several high-performance helpers are being launched. These include a steam cleaner, a cordless window vacuum cleaner, and a spot cleaner, all designed to make household chores easier and more efficient. The steam cleaner features a 120°C steam jet and various attachments, while the cordless window vacuum offers streak-free cleaning with an automatic water vacuum function.

articles.title: Spied: New Jaguar Super-GT
articles.author: Autocar
articles.summary: Jaguar is developing a new Super-GT, a Taycan rival. The prototype confirms the absence of a rear window and highlights unique design elements. This indicates the unveiling of a new product prototype from Jaguar.

articles.title: I tested cordless robot vacuums – the winner even has a mop function and can be sent to specific rooms using an app
articles.author: Senior Feature Writer
articles.summary: The article reviews several robot vacuum cleaners including Eufy G50 Hybrid, Ultenic D10, Beko Robot Vacuum Cleaner, iRobot Roomba Combo 2 Essential, Midea i5C 4-in-1 Cleaning System, and Hobot Legee Q10. These products vary in features such as suction power, mapping technology, mopping function, and app integration, with prices ranging from £159.99 to £299. The reviewer assesses the performance of each vacuum cleaner on different floor types and in various cleaning scenarios.

articles.title: I tested cordless robot vacuums – the winner even has a mop function and can be sent to specific rooms using an app
articles.author: Alex Lloyd
articles.summary: The article reviews the functionality of different robot vacuum cleaners and introduces Hobot Legee Q10 with six cleaning modes and up to 5,000Pa of suction. Sun readers can purchase Hobot Legee Q10 for £240 by using the code TheSunQ10 on Amazon.

articles.title: Creating Shared Value: Nestl's NLDP Steady Moves Towards Sustainable Local Dairy Production In Nigeria
articles.author: Daily Independent
articles.summary: Nestl Nigeria, through its Creating Shared Value strategy and the Nestl Nigeria Livestock Development Project (NLDP), has unveiled Paikon Kore's N1.8 billion dairy demonstration farm. This initiative aims to enhance the local dairy industry.

articles.title: Incense startups sniff better opportunity abroad as local market, dominated by legacy players, limits prospects
articles.author: Samiksha Goel
articles.summary: Indian incense startups like Kalyanamm and Nirmalaya are expanding internationally, targeting markets in the US, Canada, and the UAE. Help Us Green is launching new incense products, including bamboo-less and Japanese incense, to meet global quality standards and expand their international presence.

articles.title: 'I'm a beauty writer and this AI tool built my 'perfect' skincare routine for free'
articles.author: Lucy Addicott
articles.summary: Noli, an AI-powered platform, offers a free service that analyzes skin and recommends personalized skincare routines.  Users receive a 'BeautyDNA' profile based on a diagnostic quiz and face scan. The platform then offers a 30% discount on the recommended skincare routine, featuring brands such as CeraVe and Lancôme.

articles.title: Flaunt That Perfect Pout: Myntra Fashion Carnival Sale
articles.summary: A new line of long-stay lipsticks infused with murumuru butter is available for purchase. The lipsticks promise intense color, hydration, transfer-resistance, and long wear, with shades ranging from nudes to bold reds. These lipsticks are being promoted at Myntra's biggest sale of the season.

articles.title: How India is redefining global beauty standards
articles.summary: The Estée Lauder Companies and Nykaa collaborate on BEAUTY&YOU India to support the launch of new beauty brands from Indian entrepreneurs. The initiative provides funding, mentorship, and a platform for innovative skincare, makeup, fragrance, and sustainable beauty lines, showcasing a vision for the future of beauty.

articles.title: How Lavato is Making Public Toilets Clean, Classy, and Profitable
articles.author: Adithi Gurkar
articles.summary: Lavato, a premium sanitation startup, launched its first premium public restroom near Krishnagiri in 2018, offering high-quality amenities.  The success of this pilot project, serving 3.5 lakh customers, validated the company's business model and led to its incubation at IIMB, facilitating expansion and attracting investors.

articles.title: The 3 Best Foldable Phones You Can Buy Today
articles.author: Dean Blake
articles.summary: The Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold, Samsung Galaxy Fold6, and Samsung Galaxy Z Flip6 are new foldable phones. Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold features a large 8' foldable screen. Samsung Galaxy Fold6 comes with a built-in stylus and advanced multitasking capabilities. The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip6 revives the flip phone concept with a portable design and powerful Snapdragon chip.

articles.title: Meghan Markle's Lifestyle Brand Is at a Critical Juncture as Launch Date Approaches
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Meghan Markle is launching her lifestyle brand, American Riviera Orchard, through Netflix's first retail stores. The brand will feature products such as jams, honey, olive oil, tableware, cosmetics, and pet shampoo, available in Netflix House superstores. This launch also aligns with the debut of her Netflix series, 'With Love, Meghan,' set to premiere on March 4.

articles.title: Microsoft is bringing this useful iPhone feature over to Windows 11
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Microsoft is preparing to launch a new iPhone-inspired Start Menu feature for Windows 11. This feature aims to simplify app organization within the Windows 11 environment, marking a product update.

articles.title: Google launches ‘Cheap AI' to Combat Rising Costs & Chinese Competition
articles.author: Sify
articles.summary: Google introduced updates to its Gemini family of LLMs, featuring a new product line with affordable pricing.

articles.title: 2025 MG ZS price and specs: Petrol lineup detailed
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: MG is expanding its ZS range with the launch of petrol-powered models including the ZS Excite, Essence, and Essence Turbo. These new models replace the old ZS Excite and ZST lineup, offering both naturally aspirated and turbocharged engine options, with the ZS Excite starting at $26,990 drive-away.

articles.title: 'The cult multi-purpose product that'll replace your body wash, shaving cream and moisturiser.'
articles.author: Erin Docherty
articles.summary: L'Occitane's Almond Shower Oil, introduced in 1989, is a multitasking shower product based on almond oil that transforms into a silky, cleansing milk upon touching water. It acts as a shaving cream, body wash, and moisturizer, leaving skin soft, smooth, and hydrated with an almond and vanilla scent, available in various sizes.

articles.title: LIXIL Water Experience Center Opens in New York  Feb. 12, 2025 01:53
articles.summary: LIXIL Corporation has opened the LIXIL Water Experience Center in New York City, showcasing kitchen and bath solutions from its brands American Standard, GROHE, DXV, INAX, and Basco. The center offers an immersive experience for the architecture and design community and consumers, featuring operational displays and interactive design areas.

articles.title: 2025 BYD Sealion 7 price and specs
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: CarExpert is offering hundreds of new car deals. Customers can browse these deals to potentially secure a great price.

articles.title: 2025 MG ZS price and specs: Petrol lineup detailed
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: MG is expanding its ZS range with petrol-powered models, including the ZS Excite, Essence, and Essence Turbo, now available in showrooms. The new petrol ZS range, starting at $26,990 drive-away, replaces older models and offers naturally aspirated and turbocharged engines. The MG ZS is backed by a 10-year, 250,000km warranty, with capped-price servicing for the first 10 visits.

articles.title: Microsoft is bringing this useful iPhone feature over to Windows 11
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing a new 'Category view' feature for the Windows 11 Start Menu, drawing inspiration from Apple's App Library. This feature categorizes apps for better organization, offering an alternative to the traditional alphabetized list. The potential launch of this feature is estimated around Fall 2025.

articles.title: 'Love Laundry' event hosted by Ken's, Grand Island chamber will have giveaways, cocktails
articles.author: Grand Island Independent
articles.summary: Ken's in Grand Island is hosting "Love Laundry," showcasing laundry brands LG, Speed Queen, and GE. The event offers attendees a chance to win a new washer and dryer set through interactive activities.

articles.title: If Your Home Is Messy, You're Gonna Wanna Check Out This List *Pronto*
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article features various new household products available for purchase on Amazon. These include items such as cord organizers by DMoose, carborundum sponges, magnetic spice jar dispensers, Command spray bottle hangers, and disposable shower hair catchers, among others. These products aim to solve common cleaning and organizing problems, offering consumers innovative solutions for home maintenance.

articles.title: Best-selling baby bag now half price at Amazon Australia: Prene Saturday Tote Bag
articles.author: Holly Hampton-Thayers
articles.summary: Prene has introduced the Saturday Tote Bag, a functional and fashionable tote designed for new mums. This bag features multiple compartments, adjustable pram hooks, a changing mat, and a mini bag, all made from Prene's signature neoprene fabric. Currently available at half price on Amazon Australia, the Saturday Tote Bag can also be used as an overnighter or gym carry-all.

articles.title: Innovative Shower Drain Hair Catchers Revolutionize Home Maintenance
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A new line of affordable devices is simplifying home maintenance. The devices prevent hair and other buildup from clogging drains, offering a hassle-free solution for homeowners and renters.

articles.title: Blue Diamond cracks 'brandmobile' scene with giant almond on wheels
articles.author: Business Journal
articles.summary: Blue Diamond Growers is launching a mobile almond marketing machine. This initiative aims to showcase the brand's almonds in a unique way.

articles.title: Beauty buffs snap up £20 Remington 'better than £270 Shark Flexstyle' as it's slashed from £50
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A user sought a replacement for their Shark styler because the curls didn't hold. The replacement product delivers a better blow-out and longer-lasting style.

articles.title: Dunkin' brings cold foam to retail aisles
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Danone North America launched new products, debuting them in two flavors.

articles.title: Currys is the latest UK retailer to let you register interest in Nintendo Switch 2 ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: UK retailer Currys is allowing customers to register their interest in future Nintendo Switch 2 updates. This action suggests the anticipation of the Nintendo Switch 2's launch or introduction of new features.

articles.title: Get $200 Off the All-New SwitchBot Robot and Cordless Vacuum Cleaner Combo
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: A versatile machine is launching with a record-low price.
